property.name: author
property.value: Hokeun Kim

property.name: description
property.value:
This accessor is used for subscribing secure messages over MQTt protocol, using authorization service provided by a local authorization entity.

This accessor requires the 'iotAuth' and 'mqtt' modules.

property.name: subscribe (port)
property.value: The topic to subscribe.

property.name: unsubscribe (port)
property.value: The topic to unsubscribe.

property.name: connection (port)
property.value: Output an object when a connection with a MQTT broker is established.

property.name: subscription (port)
property.value: When subscribed, includes subscription information.

property.name: received (port)
property.value: The received message.

property.name: receivedTopic (port)
property.value: The topic of received message

property.name: brokerHost (parameter)
property.value: The MQTT broker's IP address or domain name.

property.name: brokerPort (parameter)
property.value: The MQTT broker's port number.

property.name: topic (parameter)
property.value: The topic to publish.

property.name: qosLevel (parameter)
property.value: The minimum QoS level of MQTT to be received by the subscriber.

property.name: subscriberName (parameter)
property.value: The subscriber's unique name in string.

property.name: authHost (parameter)
property.value: Auth's IP address or domain name.

property.name: authPort (parameter)
property.value: Auth's port number.

property.name: authCertPath (parameter)
property.value: The path for the X.509 certificate file (in pem format) of Auth with which the publisher is registered.

property.name: subscriberPrivateKeyPath (parameter)
property.value: The path for the pem format private key of the subscriber.

property.name: publicKeyCryptoSpec (parameter)
property.value: The specification for the public cryptography algorithms to be used for communication with Auth

property.name: distributionCryptoSpec (parameter)
property.value: The specification for the symmetric cryptography algorithms to be used for communication with Auth

property.name: sessionCryptoSpec (parameter)
property.value: The specification for the symmetric cryptography algorithms to be used for publishing messages from the publishers
